price: 或者你有一座园圃，种植着椰枣和葡萄，你使河流贯穿其间；
arabic: أَوۡ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٞ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَعِنَبٖ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرَ خِلَٰلَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: aw takūna laka jannatun min nakhīlin waʿinabin fatufajjira al-anhāra khilālahā tafjīran
